sei:createLoad.upload: <load action="LOAD_PUBLISHED"> <price_list id="DLC_UK_PL" site_id="DLC_UK_ONLINE"> <offering_prices code="aSpaceSuit Red"> <price type="SALEPRICE" currency="GBP" net="${randPricePrefix}0.00" /> <price type="WAS" currency="GBP" net="${randPricePrefix}1.00" /> <price type="RRP" currency="GBP" net="${randPricePrefix}2.00" /> </offering_prices> </price_list> <price_list id="DLC_US_PL" site_id="DLC_US_ONLINE"> <offering_prices code="aSpaceSuit Red"> <price type="SALEPRICE" currency="USD" net="${randPricePrefix}0.00" /> <price type="WAS" currency="USD" net="${randPricePrefix}1.00" /> <price type="RRP" currency="USD" net="${randPricePrefix}2.00" /> </offering_prices> </price_list> </load>
